title: 'Color Coded' Pushes The Spectrum Of Online Story-Telling
teaser: This is not your father's radio! NPR's website offers new ways of telling stories. Visuals editor Kainaz Amaria speaks to NPR's Rachel Martin about the network's newest online immersive experience.
contentencoded:
This is not your father's radio! NPR's website offers new ways of telling stories. Visuals editor Kainaz Amaria speaks to NPR's Rachel Martin about the network's newest online immersive experience.
